Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Megaton (In T-Rex form) heard a buzzing sound, turned and saw the saw dropp=
ing toward him. The mutant skipped to the side just enough to avoid contact=
. The saw struck the ground sending shards of earth bouncing off his Dinosa=
ur body.  He didn't have time to transform into his larger form, in his min=
d he didn't need it. The purpleish dinosaur opened his big mouth and did wh=
at he did best. (This should scare everyone away "Will you be my special fr=
iend?" JK ) The mutant used his elemental side to fire three eight foot  sh=
ards of ice at Surgital

Zoes shots struck him. the single bursts hadn't pe=
netrated his thick hide yet but there were bruises forming where they impac=
ted. The T-Rex turned his head deciding to take care of the smallest nuisca=
nce first  The annoyance had already been taken care of, he turned his head=
 to attack Zoe but she was already being scooped up by Slayer.

The mighty =
Mutant gets a response from the other Predacons "Who's the enemy there?"
Th=
e voice was familiar but the sounds of battle drowned it out. "Pick an enem=
y and you'll probably be right, I've arranged a ceasefire with the Maximals=
 so make sure to tell the troops NOT to fire on any Maximals." He quickly g=
lanced around to see if there were any bots that he'd recognized. The monst=
rosity didn't have time to worry about who, what, or why, the here and now =
said to defend himself. "I'm sorry, I've been a little busy scrapping first=
 to ask who they are, I'll try to leave the next bot who shoots at me funct=
ional enough to ask." he says sarcastically.

That's enough responce for th=
is post, I'll continue soon.



----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dcobu=
rn 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, April 01, 2001 11:29 AM
 =
 Subject: Re: CF Skimirsh


  OOC: Hehe Cyberwolf, don't forget there is al=
so a neautral bounty hunter(Quatro) there.  And watch out, the Terrorcons c=
an form Abominus anytime!
  ::Cutthroat/Triggerhappy/Bodicons/Composer/Quat=
ro::
   
      Cutthroat is suddenly blinded by smoke.  He waved it away, a=
nd was enraged.
   
      "Cutthroat slag Autobot trash buckets!!!!" Cutthr=
oat yelled.
   
      Cutthroat shot a big stream of flame from his mouth a=
t the CF.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Triggerhapp=
y cackled, then fired a compressed air shot from Blowpipe at the CF.
  ~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        The Bodicons saw this "Alli=
ance" coming to help the Maximals.
   
        "COMBINE!!!!!!!!" Decapitron=
 yelled.
   
        The other 4 Bodicons got close to Decapitron.  Then, t=
heir bodies all got into the right positions and they formed a huge gestalt=
 warrior called Surgital.
   
         "It's time for your operation!!!!" S=
urgital yelled down at the Alliance members.
   
         The Bodicons all =
agreed on a target.  Surgital's hand converted into a massive spinning saw.=
  He lowered his hand down and attempted to cut Megaton in half.
  ~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         Composer eventually arrived at=
 the scene.  He landed beside Zardus.
   
         "My leader, I'm here to =
help you aid the Maximals.  Wheeljack is coming as well," Composer informed=
 Zardus of his arrival.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     =
   Quatro could hear the battle all around him.  Quatro went outside and sa=
w the gestalt warrior Surgital, and the Alliance coming to help Maximals.
 =
  
        "The Maximals and their allies can fend off the Decepticons by t=
hemselves.  I've got a feeling that this is a big trick.  I have to see Meg=
atron," Quatro said to himself.
   
        Quatro ran around, trying to be=
 stealthy so that nobody could see him.  He didn't want to waste power on u=
sing his stealth mode here.  Then, when he was away from the battle, he did=
 a data search on the Decepticons to try and find their base. 
   
        =
 "Decepticon Base:Dark Avian," Quatro said aloud.
   
         Quatro trans=
formed to hoverbike mode, and speeded off towards the Dark Avian.
